page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: Lewknor C.E.Primary school is the only educational establishment in our block. There is the Headteacher,Mr.Benford, and two teachers who each have a vertically grouped class(4-11 yrs.). We work as one big class for individual work and some projects and the teachers team-teach. For games,art and craft,and music we are split into 'A'group (4-7) and 'B'and 'C'group (7-9 &9-11). We have a lot of our parents and others in to help;craft,woodwork,swimming,animal care cooking,music-making. We also have special times like Choice afternoon, which you plan yourself, and Friday club,which we make refreshments for when the villagers come in for a talk or slide show.
